content: I'd be interested in feedback to this proposal: https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/1744 It relates here as it attempts to better handle reading into an uninitialized buffer.
I've raised a few concerns. Still want to understand the BufMut API better, is there an easy way to browse the docs for the git version of bytes crate?
Also I'll read through the doc linked buy sfackler@ and comment on it.
